import { Form, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import classes from './AuthForm.module.css' function AuthForm() { // we have to get access to querey parameters to get which page we want Login wiether SignUp page // there is a hook in react router (useSearchParams) return ( <>

{isLogin ? 'Log in' : 'Create a new user'}

{/*Here we are going to use query parameters*/} {isLogin ? 'Create new user' : 'Login'}
) } export default AuthForm
